name: Esoftplay Multipanel Client
author: Esoftplay Inc

sections.description:
This WordPress plugin use for handle request remote panel by Multipanel Web Server.
To Create Multipanel Web Server, please contact us ( see phone number or email address at bottom of website ).

Feature :

  1. Manage Multiple Website.
  2. Log Activity of Content.
  3. Just Once Sign In and You can manage content of your own website.

Contact Us :

  1. Phone : +62818550122
  2. Email : danang@esoftplay.com , danang@fisip.net
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working ?

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/esoftplay-multipanel-client directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

How to find your salt ?

  1. open wp-config.php and find AUTH_SALT.
